data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 25,697 people in the state of Grand Port who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Grand Port, Mauritius
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Grand Port, Mauritius. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Grand Port, Mauritius.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Grand Port. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Grand Port, Mauritius.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Grand Port, Mauritius. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, show your mercy on the 102,015 people in Grand Port who are far from you. Please add 22 new house churches this year.
Father, guide the church in Grand Port, Mauritius to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Grand Port, Mauritius has a population of 113,000.

We estimate Grand Port has 10,986 people who might know Jesus, 25,697 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 76,318 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.
